title: Jessica: The little girl who loves Jesus
description: Jessica: The little girl who loves Jesus - is a series of fun stories for children ages 4-8 years old. Each story, though contemporary, has a Christian theme with an aim to instil good moral principles in children from an early age. Jessica is rather adorable but at the same time very amusing. The book has colourful pictorial illustrations, which will make the child’s reading experience more enjoyable. This is Book 1. “Meet Jessica” as Jessica meets Jesus. Have fun as you get to know Jessica. She will surely take you for a ride.
author: Beverley Malcolm
